::KitKat::

She got the transmission. "Good, you may come to my base and talk to 
Destrutor."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Magnus and datatron with there troops following quickly. They 
landed at the 
> quadanets Destructor had sent. Magnus sent a comm.."Kit Kat. We 
have come to 
> seek your hand in this alliance we have planned. You and I have the 
same 
> goal..we have simialar enimies and simialr allies. I wish you to 
join us in 
> out quest for the destruction of the alliance."
